Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
